fields.label: Brief Project Description

social-media.title: Social Media Setup Onboarding
social-media.description: Please provide the following information to help us set up your social media profiles effectively.

fields.label: Brief description of your business/brand
fields.name: brand_description
fields.placeholder: What your business does, your target audience, etc.

fields.text: Please email your logo, color scheme and any brand guidelines to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

event-poster.title: Event Poster Design Onboarding
event-poster.description: Please provide details about your event poster requirements.

fields.label: Additional Design Preferences
fields.name: design_preferences
fields.placeholder: Colors, themes, or specific elements you'd like included

fields.text: Please email any logos, images or brand materials to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

global-pack.title: Startup Brand Pack Onboarding
global-pack.description: Help us create the perfect brand pack for your startup.

fields.label: Business Description
fields.name: business_description
fields.placeholder: What does your business do? Who is your target audience?

fields.label: Brand Vision

fields.placeholder: How do you want your brand to be perceived?

fields.label: Preferred Colors
fields.name: color_preferences
fields.placeholder: Any specific colors you'd like us to use?

fields.label: Business Card Information
fields.name: card_info
fields.placeholder: Name, title, phone, email, address, etc. for your business cards

fields.text: Please email any existing brand assets or inspiration examples to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

quick-amendments.title: Quick Amendments Onboarding
quick-amendments.description: Tell us about the changes you need to your existing design.

fields.label: Describe the changes needed
fields.name: amendment_description
fields.placeholder: Specific text or image changes required

fields.text: Please email your current design that needs amendments to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

layout-design.title: Custom Layout Design Onboarding
layout-design.description: Help us understand your layout design needs.

fields.label: Layout Preferences
fields.name: layout_preferences
fields.placeholder: Describe your vision for the layout

fields.text: Please email your content (text, images, logos) to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

recreate-design.title: Recreate Design Onboarding
recreate-design.description: Help us understand what design you need recreated.

fields.label: Design Description
fields.name: design_description
fields.placeholder: Describe the design you want recreated

fields.label: Changes Desired
fields.name: desired_changes
fields.placeholder: Any changes you'd like from the original design

fields.text: Please email the design you want recreated to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

full-design-package.title: Full Design Package Onboarding
full-design-package.description: Let's get started on your comprehensive design package.

fields.label: Brand Vision

fields.label: Contact Information
fields.name: contact_info
fields.placeholder: Phone, address, social media links, etc.

fields.text: Please email your logo and any brand assets to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

branding-refresh.title: Branding Refresh Onboarding
branding-refresh.description: Help us refresh your brand with a modern look.

fields.label: What do you want to keep from your current brand?

fields.label: What do you want to change?

fields.placeholder: Elements you want to update or replace

fields.label: Brand Vision
fields.name: brand_vision

fields.text: Please email your current logo and brand assets to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

email-marketing.title: Email Marketing Setup Onboarding
email-marketing.description: Let's set up your email marketing templates and systems.

fields.placeholder: Who are you sending emails to?

fields.text: Please email your logo and any brand assets to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

website-maintenance.title: Website Maintenance & Updates Onboarding
website-maintenance.description: Let us know about your website maintenance needs.

fields.label: Current Issues
fields.name: current_issues
fields.placeholder: Any existing problems with your website?

fields.label: Maintenance Requirements
fields.name: maintenance_requirements
fields.placeholder: What specific maintenance do you need?

fields.label: Update Frequencies
fields.name: update_frequencies
fields.placeholder: How often do you need content updates?

fields.text: We'll contact you to securely arrange website access credentials.

blog-setup.title: Blog Setup & Content Writing Onboarding
blog-setup.description: Let's set up your professional blog with great content.

fields.label: Blog Topic/Niche
fields.name: blog_topic
fields.placeholder: What will your blog focus on?

fields.label: First 3 Blog Post Ideas
fields.name: post_ideas
fields.placeholder: Topic ideas for your first blog posts

fields.label: Content Creation
fields.name: content_creation
options: I need content written for me

fields.text: Please email any brand assets or style preferences to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

landing-page.title: Landing Page Design Onboarding
landing-page.description: Let's create a high-converting landing page for your product or service.

fields.label: Key Benefits
fields.name: key_benefits
fields.placeholder: List the main benefits for your customers

fields.label: Call to Action
fields.name: call_to_action
fields.placeholder: e.g., Buy Now, Sign Up, Learn More

fields.label: Target Audience
fields.name: target_audience
fields.placeholder: Who are you targeting with this landing page?

fields.text: Please email your logo, product images, and any other assets to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

portfolio.title: Online Portfolio for Creatives Onboarding
portfolio.description: Let's build a stunning portfolio to showcase your creative work.

fields.label: Portfolio Description
fields.name: portfolio_description
fields.placeholder: Brief description of your work and style

fields.label: Design Preferences
fields.name: design_preferences
fields.placeholder: Any specific styles, layouts, or examples you like

fields.text: Please email a selection of your portfolio pieces (5-15 works) to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

multilingual-website.title: Multilingual Website Setup Onboarding
multilingual-website.description: Let's create your website to reach audiences in multiple languages.

fields.label: Website Purpose & Content
fields.name: website_purpose
fields.placeholder: What is your website for and what content will it have?

fields.text: Please email your logo, brand assets, and any existing content to info@enfoldedmedia.com with your order number in the subject line.

quick-starter-package-v2.title: Quick Starter Package V2 Onboarding
quick-starter-package-v2.description: Let's get your simple website set up quickly! Please provide the following information.

fields.label: Website Content
fields.name: website_content
fields.placeholder: Brief description of what content you want on your page (about you/business, services, etc.)

fields.label: Contact Information to Display
fields.name: contact_info
fields.placeholder: Phone, email, address you want visitors to see

standard-package-v2.title: Standard Package V2 Onboarding
standard-package-v2.description: Perfect for small businesses! Let's build your 5-page website. Please provide the following details.

fields.label: Your Name/Business Name
fields.name: business_name
fields.placeholder: Your full name or business name

fields.label: Which pages do you need? (up to 5)
fields.name: pages_needed

fields.label: Business Description
fields.name: business_description
fields.placeholder: Tell us about your business, services, and what makes you unique

fields.label: Content for Each Page
fields.name: page_content
fields.placeholder: Describe what content you want on each page you selected

fields.label: Do you want a blog?
fields.name: blog_needed
options: Yes, set up a blog section

business-package-v2.title: Business Package V2 Onboarding
business-package-v2.description: Let's create your professional business website with up to 10 pages. Please provide comprehensive details.

fields.label: Which pages do you need? (up to 10)
fields.name: pages_needed

fields.label: Detailed Business Description
fields.name: business_description
fields.placeholder: Comprehensive description of your business, mission, values, and unique selling points

fields.label: Services/Products Details
fields.name: services_products
fields.placeholder: List and describe your main services or products

fields.label: Business Address
fields.name: business_address
fields.placeholder: Full business address for contact page

woocommerce-package-v2.title: E-commerce Package (WooCommerce) V2 Onboarding
woocommerce-package-v2.description: Let's set up your online store! Please provide detailed information about your e-commerce needs.

fields.label: Number of Products (up to 50 included)
fields.name: product_count
fields.placeholder: Approximately how many products will you start with?

fields.label: Product Categories/Types
fields.name: product_categories
fields.placeholder: List the main categories of products you'll sell (e.g., clothing, electronics, books)

fields.label: Business/Store Description
fields.name: store_description
fields.placeholder: Describe your business, what you sell, and your brand story

fields.label: Business Address
fields.name: business_address
fields.placeholder: Required for legal compliance and returns

fields.label: Special Requirements
fields.name: special_requirements
fields.placeholder: Any specific features, integrations, or requirements for your store?

premium-package-v2.title: Premium Package V2 Onboarding
premium-package-v2.description: Let's create your custom, advanced website! This comprehensive form will help us understand your unique requirements.

fields.label: Project Overview
fields.name: project_overview
fields.placeholder: Comprehensive description of your project, goals, and vision

fields.label: Technical Requirements
fields.name: technical_requirements
fields.placeholder: Any specific technical requirements, integrations, or hosting preferences

fields.label: Inspiration/References
fields.name: inspiration
fields.placeholder: Links to websites you like or specific features you want to include
